title: On the Black Hill
occurrences: (Amos) Hurry now. There's a farm for rent on the Black Hill.
House and outbuildings, with 120 acres and grazing rights on the Black Hill.
She said my real mother was a girl from on a farm, on the Black Hill,
regex: \b((?!\bOn\ the\ Black\ Hill:)On\ the\ Black\ Hill)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
